name: Vegan Creamy Chipotle Pasta
description: This vegan creamy chipotle pasta is super easy to make and absolutely delicious!

video.name: Creamy Vegan Chipotle Pasta
video.description: Creamy Vegan Chipotle Pasta, spicy, creamy chipotle sauce over spaghetti.

recipeIngredient: 1  Chipotle pepper in Adobo, ((only one of the peppers in the can))

recipeInstructions.text: Place the almonds, almond milk, water, chipotle, garlic clove, roasted tomato, and lemon juice in a blender and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the almonds, almond milk, water, chipotle, garlic clove, roasted tomato, and lemon juice in a blender and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil pasta according to the instructions on the box. Drain and place in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil pasta according to the instructions on the box. Drain and place in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour chipotle sauce over pasta and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour chipotle sauce over pasta and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with chopped cilantro on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with chopped cilantro on top.
